Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3651 LINDELL ROAD,SUITE D131, LAS VEGAS, Nevada, 89103, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Golden Matrix Group Inc is an established gaming technology company that develops and owns online gaming IP and builds configurable and scalable white-label social gaming platforms for its international customers, located in the Asia Pacific region. The gaming IP includes tools for marketing, acquisition, retention and monetization of users. The company's platform can be accessed through both desktop and mobile applications. Its sophisticated software automatically declines any gaming or redemption requests from within the United States, in strict compliance with US law.
